content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":232172,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その武闘大会って――」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That martial arts tournament—\""},{"lineNumber":232173,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふっ……名前くらいは知ってるかもな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh... I might at least know the name.\""},{"lineNumber":232174,"originalJapaneseLine":"アームズはニッと頬を歪めて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Arms sneered slightly,"},{"lineNumber":232175,"originalJapaneseLine":"その名を伝えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and told the name."},{"lineNumber":232176,"originalJapaneseLine":"「毎年、闘神都市で開かれる、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Every year, held in the Fighting God City,"},{"lineNumber":232177,"originalJapaneseLine":"　世界一の強者を決める大会」","translatedEnglishLine":"the tournament to decide the strongest in the world.\""},{"lineNumber":232178,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――その名も闘神大会」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—It’s called the Fighting God Tournament.\""},{"lineNumber":232179,"originalJapaneseLine":"「出場者には魔剣カオスを","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Participants are given a chance to obtain the Demon Sword Chaos."},{"lineNumber":232180,"originalJapaneseLine":"　手に入れるチャンスが与えられる」","translatedEnglishLine":"They are granted the opportunity to acquire it.\""},{"lineNumber":232181,"originalJapaneseLine":"「君達一行はできるだけ","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Your group should participate as much as possible,"},{"lineNumber":232182,"originalJapaneseLine":"　参加した方がいいだろうね」","translatedEnglishLine":"it would be best to join.\""},{"lineNumber":232183,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":232184,"originalJapaneseLine":"「トーナメント展開？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tournament format?\""},{"lineNumber":232185,"originalJapaneseLine":"西ヘルマンを出発したあなた達は、","translatedEnglishLine":"Having departed West Helman, you all"},{"lineNumber":232186,"originalJapaneseLine":"現在、自由都市を目指していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"are currently heading toward the Free City."},{"lineNumber":232187,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":232188,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":232189,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは今日も一日の終わりに","translatedEnglishLine":"At the end of another day, you"},{"lineNumber":232190,"originalJapaneseLine":"日課である日記を書き上げて、ペンを置く。","translatedEnglishLine":"finish your routine diary entry and put down your pen."},{"lineNumber":232191,"originalJapaneseLine":"立ち寄った街の酒場で、","translatedEnglishLine":"At a tavern in the town you stopped by,"},{"lineNumber":232192,"originalJapaneseLine":"騒ぎが起きていると聞き","translatedEnglishLine":"you heard there was a commotion,"},{"lineNumber":232193,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたと長田君は覗きに来た。","translatedEnglishLine":"so you and Nagata came to take a look."},{"lineNumber":232194,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ッカーーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kkaaaaaa!\""},{"lineNumber":232195,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ん、ふう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Mmm, phew.\""},{"lineNumber":232196,"originalJapaneseLine":"行ってみると、","translatedEnglishLine":"When you went to see,"},{"lineNumber":232197,"originalJapaneseLine":"何故かザンスと乱義の二人が","translatedEnglishLine":"for some reason, Zans and Rangi were"},{"lineNumber":232198,"originalJapaneseLine":"飲み比べをしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"engaged in a drinking contest."},{"lineNumber":232199,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ……お前られるかぁ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-oh... are you guys...!?\""},{"lineNumber":232200,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんの用らって……らったったぁ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What do you want... wha-what?\""},{"lineNumber":232201,"originalJapaneseLine":"「べろべろじゃん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're totally wasted!\""},{"lineNumber":232202,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アア！？　酔ってれーよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah!? I'm not drunk!\""},{"lineNumber":232203,"originalJapaneseLine":"　余裕らぁ、ろっけがぁ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I've got this under control!\""},{"lineNumber":232204,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、なんて？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh, what?\""},{"lineNumber":232205,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":232206,"originalJapaneseLine":"一方、乱義はそっと自分の目を覆っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, Rangi quietly covered his own eyes."},{"lineNumber":232207,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……眼球が燃えてる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...My eyeballs are burning.\""},{"lineNumber":232208,"originalJapaneseLine":"「燃えてないよ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They're not burning!?\""},{"lineNumber":232209,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とにかく！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Anyway!"},{"lineNumber":232210,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今、勝負の最中らがが、邪魔すんじゃれーぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We're in the middle of a match, so don't get in the way!\""},{"lineNumber":232211,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えー……えー……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh... eh...\""},{"lineNumber":232212,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何してんのこの二人……」","translatedEnglishLine":"What are these two doing...?\""},{"lineNumber":232213,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さっきからこの調子でね、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They've been like this for a while now,"},{"lineNumber":232214,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うちのいっとうキツい酒をパカパカと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"downing my strongest liquor one after another...\""},{"lineNumber":232215,"originalJapaneseLine":"「し、しかし……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"B-but...\""},{"lineNumber":232216,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こっんなキツい酒を意地だけであれほど……","translatedEnglishLine":"to drink such strong liquor purely out of willpower...\""},{"lineNumber":232217,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ごくり……根性のあるガキ共だぜ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"*gulp*... They're gutsy kids...\""},{"lineNumber":232218,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ……俺には分かる……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah... I can tell...\""},{"lineNumber":232219,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こいつら将来きっとひとかどの人物になるぜ」","translatedEnglishLine":"These guys will surely become great individuals in the future.\""},{"lineNumber":232220,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐわっははははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gwahahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":232221,"originalJapaneseLine":"　勝負だと！？　何故オレを呼ばない！」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a match!? Why didn't you call me?!"},{"lineNumber":232222,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これを飲めばいいんだな！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then I'll drink this!!!!\""},{"lineNumber":232223,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んぐっ！　んぐっ！　んぐっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Glug! Glug! Glug!\""},{"lineNumber":232224,"originalJapaneseLine":"元就はザンス達の飲み方のように、","translatedEnglishLine":"Motonari, unlike Zans and the others,"},{"lineNumber":232225,"originalJapaneseLine":"小さいグラスでは飲まず、","translatedEnglishLine":"did not drink from a small glass,"},{"lineNumber":232226,"originalJapaneseLine":"瓶ごとラッパ飲みし始めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"but started chugging straight from the bottle."},{"lineNumber":232227,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぶはーーーーー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Buhahaaaa!\""},{"lineNumber":232228,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぐわっはははははは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gwahahahahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":232229,"originalJapaneseLine":"ばたーん！","translatedEnglishLine":"*Thud!*"},{"lineNumber":232230,"originalJapaneseLine":"元就がブッ倒れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Motonari collapsed."},{"lineNumber":232231,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大声で喚くな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't shout so loudly...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっ……名前くらいは知ってるかもな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh... I might at least know the name."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズはニッと頬を歪めて、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Every year, held in the Fighting God City,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界一の強者を決める大会」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the tournament to decide the strongest in the world."
"Participants are given a chance to obtain the Demon Sword Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手に入れるチャンスが与えられる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are granted the opportunity to acquire it."
"Your group should participate as much as possible,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 参加した方がいいだろうね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it would be best to join."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 西ヘルマンを出発したあなた達は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having departed West Helman, you all

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在、自由都市を目指していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are currently heading toward the Free City.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは今日も一日の終わりに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the end of another day, you

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日課である日記を書き上げて、ペンを置く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: finish your routine diary entry and put down your pen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 立ち寄った街の酒場で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At a tavern in the town you stopped by,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 騒ぎが起きていると聞き
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you heard there was a commotion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたと長田君は覗きに来た。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so you and Nagata came to take a look.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故かザンスと乱義の二人が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for some reason, Zans and Rangi were

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんの用らって……らったったぁ？」
一方、乱義はそっと自分の目を覆っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Rangi quietly covered his own eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、勝負の最中らがが、邪魔すんじゃれーぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're in the middle of a match, so don't get in the way!"
"They've been like this for a while now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うちのいっとうキツい酒をパカパカと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: downing my strongest liquor one after another..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっんなキツい酒を意地だけであれほど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to drink such strong liquor purely out of willpower..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ごくり……根性のあるガキ共だぜ……」
こいつら将来きっとひとかどの人物になるぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These guys will surely become great individuals in the future."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝負だと！？　何故オレを呼ばない！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a match!? Why didn't you call me?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んぐっ！　んぐっ！　んぐっ！」
元就はザンス達の飲み方のように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Motonari, unlike Zans and the others,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 小さいグラスでは飲まず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: did not drink from a small glass,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 瓶ごとラッパ飲みし始めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but started chugging straight from the bottle.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日課である日記を書き上げて、ペンを置く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: finish your routine diary entry and put down your pen.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At a tavern in the town you stopped by,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you heard there was a commotion,

一方、乱義はそっと自分の目を覆っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Rangi quietly covered his own eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、勝負の最中らがが、邪魔すんじゃれーぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're in the middle of a match, so don't get in the way!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うちのいっとうキツい酒をパカパカと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: downing my strongest liquor one after another..."

こいつら将来きっとひとかどの人物になるぜ」
